author: Opinion by Rick Santorum
title: Rick Santorum: Workers should come first in emergency coronavirus legislation
description: We are all coming to terms with the economic consequences of the extraordinary circumstances we find ourselves in because of the coronavirus. Who could have foreseen that self-distancing would turn into being self-quarantined with businesses all over the coun…
content:
Rick Santorum is a CNN senior political commentator and a former Republican senator from Pennsylvania. The views expressed in this commentary are his own. View more opinion on CNN.
